Uses of Package
mgui.interfaces.graphics

  • Packages that use mgui.interfaces.graphics 
    Package Description
    mgui.interfaces
    This package contains all main interface objects (object which provides user interations) for ModelGUI.
    mgui.interfaces.console  
    mgui.interfaces.graphics
    Provides graphical windows for user interaction with model objects.
    mgui.interfaces.graphics.util  
    mgui.interfaces.graphics.video  
    mgui.interfaces.graphs
    Provides an interface for user interaction with graph objects.
    mgui.interfaces.layouts  
    mgui.interfaces.plots  
    mgui.interfaces.queries  
    mgui.interfaces.shapes
    This package provides interfaces for user interaction with shapes and shape models.
    mgui.interfaces.shapes.selection  
    mgui.interfaces.shapes.video  
    mgui.interfaces.shapes.volume  
    mgui.interfaces.tables  
    mgui.interfaces.tools.graphics  
    mgui.io.domestic.videos  
    mgui.io.domestic.views  
    mgui.morph.sections  
  • Classes in mgui.interfaces.graphics used by mgui.interfaces 
    Class and Description
    GraphicListener
    Deprecated.  
    GraphicMouseListener
    Mouse listener on an InterfaceGraphic object.
    InterfaceGraphic
    The base class for all graphical interface windows.
    InterfaceGraphicWindow
    Provides a title for an InterfaceGraphic window, which is a button.
    View3D
    Represents a specific 3D view, defined by a frozen Camera3D object.
    WindowContainer
    Marker interface for all window containers
    WindowEvent
    Specifies an event on a graphics window (instance of InterfaceGraphic).
    WindowListener
    Specifies a listener on InterfaceGraphicWindow objects.
  • Classes in mgui.interfaces.graphics used by mgui.interfaces.console 
    Class and Description
    InterfaceGraphic
    The base class for all graphical interface windows.
    InterfaceGraphicTextBox
    Represents a labelled text box which updates from mouse movement events on its registered InterfaceGraphic components.
  • Classes in mgui.interfaces.graphics used by mgui.interfaces.graphics 
    Class and Description
    CanvasEvent 
    Graphic2DGrid
    Defines a 2D grid, for display in an InterfaceGraphic2D window.

    GraphicEvent.EventType 
    GraphicListener
    Deprecated.  
    GraphicMouseListener
    Mouse listener on an InterfaceGraphic object.
    GraphicPropertyListener 
    InterfaceCanvas3D
    Acts as an InterfaceGraphic wrapper for the Canvas3D object, to enable mouse handling which passes the correct source panel (set here as ).
    InterfaceGraphic
    The base class for all graphical interface windows.
    InterfaceGraphic.GraphicType 
    InterfaceGraphic3D
    Interface class for Java3D display.
    InterfaceGraphicListener
    Specifies a listener on InterfaceGraphic objects.
    InterfaceGraphicTextBox
    Represents a labelled text box which updates from mouse movement events on its registered InterfaceGraphic components.
    InterfaceGraphicWindow
    Provides a title for an InterfaceGraphic window, which is a button.
    InterfaceGraphicWindow.GraphicButton
    Button to display window title; overrides UI delegate.
    View3D
    Represents a specific 3D view, defined by a frozen Camera3D object.

    Marker interface for all window containers

    Specifies an event on a graphics window (instance of InterfaceGraphic).
